name: Suit Up
description:
Navigate Matt through each level by collecting key cards to open the door. As you progress through each level the co-workers (enemies) get tougher and faster. Lose and its game over.

FEATURE LIST:

  • Large-scale 3D project.
  • Fast-pace action base game and Stealth mechanic.
  • Survival theme
  • 4 challenging levels
